page.title: 01General Introduction
page.content: We live in two villages in rural Cambridgeshire called Steeple Morden and Litlington.There is evidence of occupation of these sites since Roman times. Most children come to school in Steeple Morden,the school has one hundred and forty nine pupils.There was a school in Litlington but it had to close due to falling numbers. Most of the land is used for farming,the main crops are wheat,barley,oilseed rape and sugar beet. Most people in Litlington work within the area but in Steeple Morden they commute. In Steeple Morden there are two shops,a Post Office and general store. In Litlington they have one shop combined with the Post Office.
